questions.question_text: Organizations that require remote browser isolation (RBI) to protect their users can automate connectivity to third-party RBI products with which platform?
What is an advantage of the unified approach of the Palo Alto Networks secure access service edge (SASE) platform over the use of multiple point products?

choices.D: It reduces network and security complexity while increasing organizational agility.
choices.B: It scans all traffic, ports, and protocols and automatically discovers new apps.
choices.C: It turns threat intelligence and external attack surface data into an intelligent data foundation to dramatically accelerate threat response.
choices.A: It allows for automation of ticketing tasks and management of tickets without pivoting between various consoles.

choices.B: It prepares the keys and certificates required for decryption, creating decryption profiles and policies, and configuring decryption port mirroring.
choices.D: It creates tunnels that allow users and systems to connect securely over a public network as if they were connecting over a local area network (LAN).
choices.C: Protection is offered in the cloud through a unified platform for complete visibility and precise control over web access while enforcing security policies that protect users from hostile websites.
choices.A: A heartbeat connection between the firewall peers ensures seamless failover in the event that a peer goes down.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
none of the rest makes sense, so C

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: C
Agreed on C

C. Protection is offered in the cloud through a unified platform for complete visibility and precise control over web access while enforcing security policies that protect users from hostile websites.

questions.question_text: What is a benefit of deploying secure access service edge (SASE) with a secure web gateway (SWG) over a SASE solution without a SWG?
